data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Sochi.
Igor Kalinin for Ural Yekaterinburg has been booked by Stanislav Vasilev and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ekaterinburg to check on Anton Zabolotnyi, who is grimacing with pain.
Free kick Sochi.
In the minute 5, Anton Zabolotnyi is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov has been booked in Ekaterinburg.
Othman El Kabir of Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
The match at Central Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Miha Mevlja, who is down injured.
In the minute 14, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Sochi throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Sochi's Miha Mevlja is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi drives forward and Ivan Novoseltsev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 20, Sergey Terekhov (Sochi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Nikita Burmistrov (Sochi) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 23, Sochi's Nikita Burmistrov misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 25, Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ivan Miladinovic (Sochi) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 32, At Central Stadium, Ural Yekaterinburg are penalized for being offside.
Christian Noboa for Sochi gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 36, Stanislav Vasilev waits before resuming play because Ivan Novoseltsev for Sochi is still down.
Throw-in for Sochi at Central Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Ivan Novoseltsev for Sochi is back on the field again.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Sochi's area.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 40, Sochi's Christian Noboa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 42, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ural Yekaterinburg's Othman El Kabir breaks free at Central Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Sochi a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Sochi's Sergey Terekhov has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Emanuel Mammana is on a sub for Ivan Novoseltsev for Sochi.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a second substitution, with Danyl Prutsev replacing Christian Noboa.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 47, Attention is being given to Sochi’s Anton Zabolotnyi and play has been suspended briefly.
Anton Zabolotnyi returns to the field for Sochi after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 49, In Ekaterinburg Sochi attack through Anton Zabolotnyi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 50, Sochi have a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev awards Sochi a goal kick.
Stanislav Vasilev awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Sochi.
Throw-in Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Danijel Miskic has run offside.
In the minute 56, Denys Kulakov (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sochi pushes forward through Nikita Burmistrov, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Ekaterinburg, Sochi push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 63, Anton Zabolotnyi (Sochi) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Pogrebnyak Pavel (Ural Yekaterinburg) strikes at Central Stadium but his header is cleared.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Sochi have a goal kick.
The home team replace Vyacheslav Podberezkin with Dmitri Efremov.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg push forward at Central Stadium and Eric Bicfalvi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sochi defence.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Stanislav Vasilev.
In the minute 70, Stanislav Vasilev signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Sochi's half.
Goal kick for Sochi at Central Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Othman El Kabir (Ural Yekaterinburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sochi make their third substitution with Elmir Nabiullin replacing Nikita Burmistrov.
In the minute 76, Stanislav Vasilev awards Sochi a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nikita Kalugin is replacing Timofey Margasov for the away team.
In the minute 79, Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In Ekaterinburg, Eric Bicfalvi of Ural Yekaterinburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 85, Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
The home team have replaced Danijel Miskic with Aleksey Evseev. This is the second substitution made today by Yuriy Matveev.
In the minute 86, Aleksey Evseev puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Throw-in for Sochi close to the penalty box.
Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Sochi make their fifth substitution with Marko Dugandzic replacing Joaozinho.
Stanislav Vasilev will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Stanislav Vasilev signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 1-0.
Ilya Pomazun (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a yellow card from Stanislav Vasilev.
Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi has been booked by Stanislav Vasilev and receives a first yellow card.
